trans-unit.source: Paperwork is a GUI to make papers searchable.
trans-unit.target: Paperwork是一个图形用户界面,可以让文件进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: There is no GUI here. The GUI is <https://gitlab.gnome.org/World/OpenPaperwork/paperwork>.
trans-unit.target: There is no GUI here. The GUI is <https://gitlab.gnome.org/World/OpenPaperwork/paperwork>.

trans-unit.source: This is the backend part of Paperwork. It manages: - The work directory / Access to the documents - Indexing - Searching - Suggestions - Import - Export
trans-unit.target: 这是Paperwork的后台部分。它管理。-工作目录/访问文件-索引-搜索-建议-导入-导出。
